goal: Enable truly autonomous agent sessions that can run for hours without human intervention

features.description: Skillbook lite - learnings file that persists across sessions
steps: Define structure: what works, what to avoid, patterns
Verify skillbook is loaded in agent context

features.description: shiplog autopilot command - outer orchestration loop
steps: Spawn claude process with sprint task
Monitor for exit (context exhaustion or completion)
On exit: count commits since start
Detect stall (N iterations with no commits)
Restart claude with fresh context + learnings

features.description: Learnings extraction - analyze session and update skillbook
steps: Read git log for session commits
Keep skillbook under token limit (trim old entries)
On session end, generate continuation prompt
Include: current sprint status, next feature, recent learnings
